FOUND IN: Appear - to become visible or come into existence suddenly.
Hogshead - A large barrel typically holding around 63 gallons (approximately 238 liters) traditionally used in English wine production.
Homegrown Talent - A player developed within a team's youth or amateur system who may not receive payment initially but can earn money through future contracts.
Scraps - Small pieces or fragments left over from something.
Desecrate - To violate the sacredness of a thing or place by profanation, pollution, or mutilation.
